00027 #ifndef __COMMAND__
00028 #define __COMMAND__
00029 
00030 #include "CommandMisc.h"
00031 #include "CommandSignature.h"
00032 
00033 class AudacityApp;
00034 class AudacityProject;
00035 class CommandOutputTarget;
00036 
00037 class CommandExecutionContext
00038 {
00039    public:
00040       AudacityApp *app;
00041       AudacityProject *proj;
00042       CommandExecutionContext(AudacityApp *app, AudacityProject *proj)
00043          : app(app), proj(proj) {}
00044 };
00045 
00046 // Interface
00047 class Command
00048 {
00049 public:
00050    virtual void Progress(double completed) = 0;
00051    virtual void Status(wxString message) = 0;
00052    virtual void Error(wxString message) = 0;
00053    virtual ~Command() { }
00054    virtual wxString GetName() = 0;
00055    virtual CommandSignature &GetSignature() = 0;
00056    virtual bool SetParameter(const wxString &paramName, const wxVariant &paramValue);
00057    virtual bool Apply(CommandExecutionContext context) = 0;
00058 };
00059 
00060 // Command which wraps another command
00061 class DecoratedCommand : public Command
00062 {
00063 protected:
00064    Command *mCommand;
00065 public:
00066    virtual void Progress(double completed);
00067    virtual void Status(wxString message);
00068    virtual void Error(wxString message);
00069 
00070    DecoratedCommand(Command *cmd)
00071       : mCommand(cmd)
00072    {
00073       wxASSERT(cmd != NULL);
00074    }
00075    virtual ~DecoratedCommand();
00076    virtual wxString GetName();
00077    virtual CommandSignature &GetSignature();
00078    virtual bool SetParameter(const wxString &paramName, const wxVariant &paramValue);
00079    virtual bool Apply(CommandExecutionContext context) = 0;
00080 };
00081 
00082 // Decorator command that performs the given command and then outputs a status
00083 // message according to the result
00084 class ApplyAndSendResponse : public DecoratedCommand
00085 {
00086 public:
00087    ApplyAndSendResponse(Command *cmd)
00088       : DecoratedCommand(cmd)
00089    { }
00090 
00091    virtual bool Apply(CommandExecutionContext context);
00092 };
00093 
00094 class CommandImplementation : public Command
00095 {
00096 private:
00097    CommandType &mType;
00098    ParamValueMap mParams;
00099 
00102    bool Valid(const wxString &paramName, const wxVariant &paramValue);
00103 
00104 protected:
00105    CommandOutputTarget *mOutput;
00106 
00107    // Convenience methods for allowing subclasses to access parameters
00108    void TypeCheck(const wxString &typeName,
00109                   const wxString &paramName,
00110                   const wxVariant &param);
00111    void CheckParam(const wxString &paramName);
00112    bool GetBool(const wxString &paramName);
00113    long GetLong(const wxString &paramName);
00114    double GetDouble(const wxString &paramName);
00115    wxString GetString(const wxString &paramName);
00116 
00117 public:
00118    // Convenience methods for passing messages to the output target
00119    void Progress(double completed);
00120    void Status(wxString status);
00121    void Error(wxString message);
00122 
00125    CommandImplementation(CommandType &type,
00126                          CommandOutputTarget *output);
00127 
00128    virtual ~CommandImplementation();
00129 
00131    wxString GetName();
00132 
00134    CommandSignature &GetSignature();
00135 
00138    bool SetParameter(const wxString &paramName, const wxVariant &paramValue);
00139 
00140    // Subclasses should override the following:
00141    // =========================================
00142 
00145    virtual bool Apply(CommandExecutionContext context);
00146 };
